Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Lankshire Parkway, between the Bushman Farms and the Arena.
Room.LongDescription: The Ivanhouse Sporting Facility, located to the west of here, is geared towards simple, one-on-one combat with a more powerful foe. Here, good characters can test their skills versus an opponent without having to worry about other people in the arena except themselves.
